long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RecruitBot is a powerful hiring platform that transforms the entire recruiting experience. Leverage AI and ML to get matched with the right candidates from a database of 650+ million, send personalized but automated communications to candidates, and easily collaborate with your team throughout.   

The RecruitBot Chrome extension lets you browse candidate profiles on LinkedIn or Twitter while logged into your RecruitBot account. If you see a candidate that you like, and RecruitBot can match them to a candidate in our profile database, you'll be able to interact with them as though you were in RecruitBot itself. 

You'll be able to rate candidates, reach out to candidates, and take notes on candidates right from the extension's interface.
